CustomField.formula: if(LEN(Customer_Name__r.ShippingStreet )>0, Customer_Name__r.ShippingStreet & " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(Customer_Name__r.ShippingCity )>0, " " &Customer_Name__r.ShippingCity & " " , "" ) & if(LEN(Customer_Name__r.ShippingState )>0, " " & Customer_Name__r.ShippingState & " " , "" )& if(LEN( Customer_Name__r.ShippingPostalCode )>0, " " & Customer_Name__r.ShippingPostalCode & " "," ") & BR() & If(LEN( Customer_Name__r.ShippingCountry ) >0," " & Customer_Name__r.ShippingCountry ,"")
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
